content.content:
After 20 years of marriage, this is the first time Taís Araujo and Lázaro Ramos have undertaken a home project from scratch. “We’ve lived in many places but never wanted to commit to a long renovation. We only made small adjustments.

The problem was that the spaces never truly felt like us,” the actor explains. This time was different. After a year of renovations, their 1950s apartment in Rio de Janeiro’s South Zone became the home they’d always wanted. “Even though almost everything is new, we see ourselves in every corner, because we designed the spaces together and filled them with objects and art tied to our story,” Taís recalls.

THE DREAM OF PERSONALIZATION


Inspired by the natural landscapes that make Brazil unique, this collection was born from deep research into the elements that define our cultural identity. From the vibrant colors of tropical forests to the serenity of beaches, and the textures of our fauna and flora, every detail was designed to convey Brazil’s spirit in an innovative and elegant way.

Raw materials were carefully selected to prioritize sustainability, reflecting the brand’s commitment to responsible practices and local resources, which are intrinsic to our identity.
